entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 a.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow changing to snow at times heavy and local blowing snow near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
